description: This file defines the ToDoCell class, a custom GWT cell widget for rendering and editing ToDoItem instances in a to-do list application. It handles view and edit modes, user interactions, and event firing.

classes.name: ToDoCell
classes.description: A GWT cell widget for rendering and editing ToDoItem objects, supporting view and edit modes, user interactions, and event firing.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the ToDoItem in view or edit mode based on current state.

methods.name: isEditing
methods.description: Checks if a given ToDoItem is currently being edited.

methods.name: onBrowserEvent
methods.description: Handles browser events such as clicks, key presses, and double clicks to manage editing and item updates.

methods.name: commitEdit
methods.description: Commits the current text input to the ToDoItem and fires an update event.

methods.name: beginEdit
methods.description: Starts editing a specific ToDoItem, rendering the cell in edit mode.

methods.name: endEdit
methods.description: Ends editing of a ToDoItem, reverting to view mode.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Re-renders the cell content after editing state changes.

methods.name: getInputElement
methods.description: Retrieves the input element in edit mode.

methods.name: getViewRootElement
methods.description: Retrieves the root div element of the view mode template.
